name: OBot

”Alexa, open obot assistant”

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: obot assistant
Developer Terms of Use
des: OBot is a virtual assistant for Ozarks Technical Community College. OBot can answer questions about admissions, registration, financial aid, student accounts and advisory services.
